parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to retrieve answers for.

parameter.label: Table
parameter.tooltip: The name of the table to update the object in (ie. change_request,incident,task,etc).

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the object to update.

parameter.label: JSON Body
parameter.tooltip: The JSON body containing the fields that should be updated.

parameters.parameter:
1. How do we know where to write data? In a polling scenario, we need to use might be able to use the configured schema name, but what field? In a push situation (ServiceNow pushes to us), how do we know where it came from, and if we should write to the same form and/or field. ***Maybe the 'sys_class_name' field on the record would work in all cases? It seems to provide the form name for the few that I've tried*** As for what field to write to, I think we need to add data to the config form, or as an input parameter for the interim/complete processes.
2. Work Note updates and assignment should NOT trigger the query to find this ticket again. How do we control that? Do we need to have a rule that says our userID as "last updater" doesn't get included in the results?
4. MIR3 vs. SWN should be handled here.
5. Replace the Get Values handlers with a search where we can return a limited amount of data. We don't need all the info, and the original details from ServiceNow will be too big and unnecessary to retrieve.

<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] notification_method_options = {"calloutInfo" => "Callout", "broadcastInfo" => "Broadcast", "bulletinBoardInfo" => "Bulletin Board", "firstResponseInfo" => "First Response"} notification_method = notification_method_options[integration_config['Notification Method']]
work_note_text = "#{notification_method} Notification \"#{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['OnSolve Notification Title']}\" (UUID: #{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']}) status update:"
report_output = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) report_result = report_output['execute_custom_report_response']['report_detail'] headers = report_result['header']['column_name'] rows = [] rows = report_result['row'] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Array) rows = [report_result['row']] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Hash)
display_line_index = headers.find_index('DISPLAYLINE'); rows.each{|row| work_note_text += "\n#{row['value'][display_line_index]}" }
work_note_text %>

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being created in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the datastore form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] duration = integration_config['Task History Duration'].to_i
{ "Task Run Id" => @run['Id'], "Delete After Date Time" => (Time.now + (86400 * duration)).iso8601 }.to_json%>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to retrieve answers for.

parameter.label: Wait time:
parameter.tooltip: Time you want to wait for deferred task

parameters.parameter: <%= integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] interval_input = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] || "{}")['Interim Update Interval'] interval_input.to_i > 5 ? interval_input.to_i : 5 %>

parameter.label: Time unit:
parameter.tooltip: Unit of measurement for time (Seconds, Minutes, Hours, Days, Weeks)

task.label: Not Forever
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Keep Task History'] == "Not Forever"

task.label: Forever
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Keep Task History'] != "Not Forever"

task.name: Update Task Activity Record with Last Activity Time

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being updated.

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: The value used to set the submission state.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of field names to values that should be set.

parameters.parameter:
<%=
{
  "Onsolve Last Activity Time" => @results['Extract Last Activity Time']['output']
}.to_json
%>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Origin ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the origin ID.

parameter.label: Parent ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the parent ID.

parameters.parameter:
<%= report_output = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) report_result = report_output['execute_custom_report_response']['report_detail'] headers = report_result['header']['column_name'] rows = [] rows = report_result['row'] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Array) rows = [report_result['row']] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Hash)
display_line_index = headers.find_index('LASTACTIVITYTIME'); if !rows.empty? last_activity_time = rows[0]['value'][display_line_index] else last_activity_time = @results['Re-Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Last Activity Time'] end
last_activity_time %>

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to retrieve answers for.

parameter.label: UUID
parameter.tooltip: The UUID for the MIR3 Notification

parameter.label: Timestamp
parameter.tooltip: The point after which to return contact attempts and responses from the report

parameters.parameter:
<%= last_activity_time = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Record']['Created At']
if @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values'].has_key? ('Onsolve Last Activity Time') if !@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Last Activity Time'].nil? last_activity_time = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Last Activity Time'] end end
Time.parse(last_activity_time).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") %>

parameter.label: Timezone
parameter.tooltip: Timezone to be used for building display lines that include textual timestamps. Options are CST, EST, PST, UTC, or USER

parameters.parameter:
<%= timezone = "UTC"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["CST","EST","PST","UTC","USER"].include? (std_params['Timezone']) timezone = std_params['Timezone'] end
timezone %>

parameter.label: Responses Used
parameter.tooltip: 0 = Do not included responses in results, 1 = Include responses

parameters.parameter:
<%= responses_used = "1"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["0","1"].include? (std_params['Responses Used']) responses_used = std_params['Responses Used'] end
responses_used %>

parameter.label: Success Responder Type
parameter.tooltip: 0 = Not needed, 1 = First and Last Name, 2 = Employee ID, 3 = User Name, 4 = Primary Key

parameters.parameter:
<%= success_responder = "2"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["0","1","2","3","4"].include? (std_params['Success Responder Type']) success_responder = std_params['Success Responder Type'] end
success_responder %>

parameter.label: Primary Key Field
parameter.tooltip: Required only if using Success Responder Type = 4, otherwise not used

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
primary_key = std_params['Primary Key'] if !std_params['Primary Key'].nil?
primary_key %>

parameter.label: Detail Level
parameter.tooltip: 1 = Contact attemptes, responses, and counts, 2 = Responses and counts, 3 = Only 'Success' responses and counts, 4 = Counts only

parameters.parameter:
<%= detail_level = "1"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["1","2","3","4"].include? (std_params['Detail Level']) detail_level = std_params['Detail Level'] end
detail_level %>

<%= report_name = "Integration Results"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
report_name = std_params['Report Name'] if !std_params['Report Name'].nil?
report_name %>

parameter.label: Error Message Title
parameter.tooltip: The title of the error message to be send with the error notification

parameters.parameter:
<%= uuid = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id'] client_reference = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id']
"Unable to retrieve interim update from MIR3 for #{client_reference} (UUID: #{uuid})" %>

parameter.label: Error Message Details
parameter.tooltip: The error message details to be sent with the error notification

parameters.parameter: <%= results = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) comments = "" results['error'].each{|key,value| comments << "\n#{key}: #{value}" } comments %>

parameter.label: Integration Id
parameter.tooltip: The Submission Id of the integration configuration record

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Submission Id of the Task Activity Monitor record

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: The receipient list to receive the notification

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] notification_method_options = {"calloutInfo" => "Callout", "broadcastInfo" => "Broadcast", "bulletinBoardInfo" => "Bulletin Board", "firstResponseInfo" => "First Response"} notification_method = notification_method_options[integration_config['Notification Method']]
work_notes = "Kinetic was unable to retrieve a status update for #{notification_method} Notification \"#{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['OnSolve Notification Title']}\" (UUID: #{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']}). It will try again at the next update interval. Error Message (if applicable):"
results = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) results['error'].each{|key,value| work_notes.push( "#{key}: #{value}" ) }
work_notes.join("\n") %>

parameter.label: Table
parameter.tooltip: The name of the table to update the object in (ie. change_request,incident,task,etc).

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the object to update.

parameter.label: JSON Body
parameter.tooltip: The JSON body containing the fields that should be updated.

parameters.parameter:
<%= output = {}
output['work_notes'] = @results['Assemble Work Note - Error']['output']
output.to_json %>

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] parameters = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters']) source_data = JSON.parse( @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Data'] ) source_id = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'] source_type_id = integration_config['Schema Type Id'] journal_type_id = parameters['Journal Object Type Id']
{ "Status" => "New", "Source" => "ServiceNow", "Source Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "Source Reference Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'], "UUID" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id'], "Task Activity Monitor Record" => JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Task Activity Monitor Submission'], "Related Activity Record" => @results['Add Submission Activity']['Id'], "Action" => "Update", "Payload" => { "table" => integration_config['Schema Name'], "id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "object_json" => { "work_notes" => @results['Assemble Work Note - Error']['output'], }.to_json }.to_json }.to_json %>

parameter.tooltip: Sets the submissions origin to another Kinetic Submission

parameter.tooltip: True or False, if Submission should be Submitted when created

<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] parameters = JSON.parse(integration_config['Interim Standard Action Parameters']) source_data = JSON.parse( @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Data'] ) source_id = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'] source_type_id = integration_config['Schema Type Id'] journal_type_id = parameters['Journal Object Type Id']
{ "Status" => "New", "Source" => "ServiceNow", "Source Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "Source Reference Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'], "UUID" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id'], "Task Activity Monitor Record" => JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Task Activity Monitor Submission'], "Related Activity Record" => @results['Add Submission Activity']['Id'], "Action" => "Update", "Payload" => { "table" => integration_config['Schema Name'], "id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "json_body" => { "work_notes" => @results['Assemble Work Note']['output'], }.to_json }.to_json }.to_json %>
